content: the little drop of wonderful is at heart a little bit of happiness make it stuff it squeeze it throw it slam it cuddle it give it away…there are so many options to bring a smile to your face or someone else s feeling sad cuddle it feeling friendly give it as a gift feeling stressed squeeeeeeze it hard feeling angry throw it at a wall just be sure you a haven t added plastic eyes first this pattern is great for experienced and beginner crocheters alike - i have included lots of tips and information plus it s quick the main body of the droplet is worked in just 29 rounds you can make the little drop of wonderful with any yarn - just be sure to choose a hook that gives you a good tight gauge for the samples pictured i used - dark blue droplet 1 x 50g ball of rico creative cotton aran 85m and a 2 5mm hook - pink droplet 15g of paintbox cotton dk 37 5m and a 2mm hook - bright blue droplet schachenmayr catania cotton 4ply and a 1 5mm hook amy from noble character crafts has written a poem that you can print out to go with your little drop of wonderful if you are giving it as a gift it s so perfect > i m a little drop of wonderful i m > here to help you out when you re > feeling frustrated and need to give a > shout > > squeeze me you won t hurt me i m > soft and very small i want you to > feel better just throw me at the > wall > > or when you have a sad day and are > feeling rather blue give me a hug > i ll dry your tears i will be here > for you > > we all have good and bad days be sure > to keep in mind you re a little > drop of wonderful and one of a kind
